ground_truth: Her eyes follow him around the room, and her head turns to him as he gets into bed beside her. She looks into his eyes for a moment as he lays his head on her shoulder before she turns back and gazes out beyond the foot of the bed. Her eyes close, and Audrey opens them again as David closes his, and his face relaxes. Joseph, in a green T-shirt with white and gold bands around the middle, walks downstairs and into the kitchen, where Audrey and David are at the table, leaning towards each other, holding hands. They look around at him, smiling. David picks up the paper, and Audrey goes to the cooker, wearing a white T-shirt and green and white striped pajama bottoms. Joseph sits at the table, looking up at her cautiously as David continues to read the paper. She turns from the cooker, and David continues to read, looking up and nodding at last. Joseph unscrews the cap of a big carton of orange juice and carefully pours himself half a glass full. He replaces the cap, stands to remove the carton from the table, and sits again, staring at the glass. The paper slides surreptitiously across the table to him. Joseph looks up at his father, who almost imperceptibly nods down at the story. Joseph pulls the paper to him and reads. Beside the headline is a black and white drawing of the heroic figure in a cape, with a particularly prominent square jaw. Joseph gazes down at the paper, his lips moving slightly, and looks up at David, mouth open. David nods expressionlessly. Joseph closes his mouth, swallows, and blinks hard. David puts a finger to his lips, and Joseph nods and wipes away a tear. David glances down, then looks up and gives Joseph a smile. At the Limited Edition Gallery, a bored security man looks at a picture, and a waitress carries a tray of food amongst the smartly dressed guests. Elijah is talking to a couple from his wheelchair, and David wanders in wearing a casual brown jacket and open-neck shirt, glances around him, and stops in front of a picture. A black woman with gray hair approaches him and looks across the busy gallery, and David looks across the busy gallery as well. Elijah wheels his chair from the gallery down the narrow corridor lined with comics, and David follows. Elijah freewheels down a ramp into his office and swings the chair around to face David. He's wearing a tight black leather zip-up jacket with short glittering blue lapels. He reaches to a shelf behind him and picks up a paper, looks at it, and turns it round, showing David the drawing of the hero in the cape.

test_cases.name: Synonym Substitution
test_cases.description:
Sure, here is the transformed text with every word replaced by an exact synonym where possible:

Her optics trail him throughout the chamber, and her cranium swivels to him as he climbs into cot beside her. She glances into his optics for an instant as he places his cranium on her shoulder before she swivels back and stares out beyond the base of the cot. Her optics shut, and Audrey uncovers them again as David shuts his, and his visage loosens. Joseph, in a verdant T-shirt with alabaster and aureate bands around the midpoint, strides downstairs and into the culinary area, where Audrey and David are at the board, leaning towards one another, clutching palms. They glance around at him, grinning. David picks up the journal, and Audrey proceeds to the stove, donning a white T-shirt and green and white banded sleepwear bottoms. Joseph perches at the board, peering up at her cautiously as David continues to peruse the journal. She swivels from the stove, and David continues to peruse, peering up and nodding at last. Joseph loosens the lid of a large carton of citrus nectar and meticulously pours himself half a tumbler full. He substitutes the lid, stands to remove the carton from the board, and perches again, gazing at the tumbler. The journal glides surreptitiously across the board to him. Joseph peers up at his progenitor, who almost imperceptibly nods down at the saga. Joseph pulls the journal to him and peruses. Beside the headline is a monochromatic sketch of the valiant figure in a cloak, with a particularly prominent rectangular chin. Joseph gazes down at the journal, his lips shifting slightly, and glances up at David, lips agape. David nods impassively. Joseph closes his lips, gulps, and blinks firmly. David places a digit to his lips, and Joseph nods and wipes away a droplet. David peeks down, then glances up and gives Joseph a grin. At the Limited Edition Gallery, a wearied guard man peers at a depiction, and a server transports a platter of nourishment among the elegantly attired patrons. Elijah is conversing with a duo from his wheelchair, and David roams in donning a relaxed brown coat and open-neck blouse, peeks around him, and halts in front of a depiction. A black woman with gray mane approaches him and peers across the bustling gallery, and David peers across the bustling gallery as well. Elijah wheels his chair from the gallery down the narrow passage lined with comics, and David follows. Elijah freewheels down a slope into his chamber and swings the chair around to confront David. He's donning a snug black leather zip-up coat with short dazzling blue lapels. He reaches to a ledge behind him and picks up a journal, glances at it, and swivels it round, showing David the sketch of the hero in the cloak.

test_cases.name: Active <-> Passive Transformation
test_cases.description: His eyes are followed around the room by her, and he is looked at as he gets into bed beside her. For a moment, his eyes are looked into by her as his head is laid on her shoulder before she turns back and the space beyond the foot of the bed is gazed at by her. Her eyes are closed, and they are opened again by Audrey as David closes his, and his face is relaxed. Joseph, in a green T-shirt with white and gold bands around the middle, is walking downstairs and into the kitchen, where Audrey and David are at the table, leaning towards each other, holding hands. They look around and smile at him. The paper is picked up by David, and the cooker is approached by Audrey, wearing a white T-shirt and green and white striped pajama bottoms. The table is sat at by Joseph, who looks up cautiously at her as the paper is continued to be read by David. She turns from the cooker, and David continues to read, finally looking up and nodding. The cap of a big carton of orange juice is unscrewed by Joseph, and half a glass full is carefully poured for himself. He replaces the cap, removes the carton from the table while standing, and sits again, staring at the glass. The paper is slid surreptitiously across the table to him. Joseph looks up at his father, who nods almost imperceptibly at the story. The paper is pulled to him by Joseph and read. Beside the headline is a black and white drawing of the heroic figure in a cape, with a particularly prominent square jaw. The paper is gazed down at by Joseph, his lips moving slightly, and David is looked up at by him, mouth open. David expressionlessly nods. Joseph closes his mouth, swallows, and blinks hard. A finger is put to his lips by David, and Joseph nods and a tear is wiped away. David glances down, then gives Joseph a smile after looking up. At the Limited Edition Gallery, a picture is looked at by a bored security man, and a tray of food is carried by a waitress amongst the smartly dressed guests. Elijah, talking to a couple from his wheelchair, is seen as David wanders in wearing a casual brown jacket and open-neck shirt, glances around himself, and stops in front of a picture. A black woman with gray hair approaches him and the busy gallery is looked across by her, and David does the same. Elijah wheels his chair from the gallery down the narrow corridor lined with comics, and he is followed by David. Elijah freewheels down a ramp into his office and swings the chair around to face David. A tight black leather zip-up jacket with short glittering blue lapels is worn by him. A paper is reached for on a shelf behind him, picked up, looked at, and turned round by him, showing David the drawing of the hero in the cape.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L1
test_cases.description: Her eyes follow him around the room, turning as he gets into bed beside her. She meets his gaze briefly as he rests his head on her shoulder, then looks beyond the foot of the bed. Her eyes close, and Audrey opens them as David relaxes with his eyes shut. Joseph, in a green T-shirt with white and gold stripes, walks to the kitchen where Audrey and David sit at the table, holding hands and smiling at him. David reads the paper while Audrey, in a white T-shirt and green-striped pajama bottoms, attends to the cooker. Joseph cautiously watches her as David reads. Joseph pours himself orange juice, returns the carton, and sits, staring at the glass. The paper slides to him, and his father nods at the story. Joseph reads, noticing a drawing of a heroic figure with a square jaw. He mouths words, looks at David, and receives a nod. Joseph swallows and wipes a tear. David signals for quiet, and Joseph nods, wiping his eyes. David smiles at him. At the Limited Edition Gallery, a bored security man observes a picture while a waitress serves guests. Elijah converses with a couple from his wheelchair, and David, in a brown jacket and open-neck shirt, stops in front of an artwork. A black woman with gray hair joins him, both gazing across the gallery. Elijah wheels down a corridor lined with comics, with David following. Elijah enters his office, turning his chair to face David. In a tight black leather jacket with blue lapels, he shows David a paper featuring a hero in a cape.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L2
test_cases.description: Her eyes track him as he gets into bed. She briefly meets his gaze, then turns away. Audrey closes her eyes as David's face relaxes. Joseph, wearing a green T-shirt with white and gold bands, goes to the kitchen where Audrey and David, holding hands at the table, smile at him. David reads the paper while Audrey, in a white T-shirt and striped pajama bottoms, cooks. Joseph carefully pours orange juice, stares at it, and David slides the paper to him. Joseph reads about a hero with a square jaw, looks at David, who nods. David signals silence as Joseph wipes a tear. David smiles at him. At the Limited Edition Gallery, a bored security man watches guests. Elijah, in a wheelchair, talks to a couple. David, in a casual brown jacket, stops to view art. A woman with gray hair joins him in looking around. Elijah wheels down a comic-lined corridor, followed by David, into his office. Wearing a black leather jacket, Elijah shows David a hero drawing.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description: Her eyes continually follow his movements around the room, and she turns her head toward him as he climbs into bed beside her. She gazes deeply into his eyes for a lingering moment when he gently lays his head upon her shoulder, before she shifts her focus back, staring thoughtfully out beyond the foot of the bed. Her eyelids flutter closed, and moments later, Audrey opens them once more, just as David lets his close and his features soften into relaxation. Meanwhile, Joseph, donned in a green T-shirt adorned with white and gold bands circling the middle, descends downstairs and enters the kitchen where both Audrey and David are seated at the table, leaning in towards one another, their hands interlocked in a tender grasp. They glance in his direction and smile warmly. David picks up the newspaper, engrossing himself, while Audrey moves over to the cooker, dressed in a simple white T-shirt paired with green and white striped pajama bottoms. Joseph sits across at the table, casting cautious glances upward towards her as David remains absorbed in his paper. She turns away from the cooker, and David looks up from the newspaper at last, nodding in acknowledgment. Joseph carefully unscrews the cap of a large carton of orange juice, meticulously pouring himself a half glass. After securing the cap back in place, he stands momentarily to remove the carton from the table, then returns to his seat, staring intently at the glass. The newspaper discreetly slides across the table towards him. Joseph lifts his gaze to meet his father’s, who barely nods in the direction of the article. Joseph draws the paper towards himself and begins to read. Just beside the headline is a striking black and white drawing of a heroic figure donning a cape, his particularly prominent square jaw catching the eye. Joseph reads the paper, his lips moving ever so slightly as he absorbs the words, then looks up at David with his mouth agape in awe. David nods subtly, his expression inscrutable. Joseph closes his mouth, swallows hard, and blinks several times to steady himself. David places a finger to his lips in a gesture of secrecy, and Joseph nods in understanding, wiping away a small tear. David glances downward briefly, then looks up to offer Joseph a reassuring smile. Over at the Limited Edition Gallery, a bored security guard stands, idly eyeing a picture, while a waitress maneuvers through the crowd of smartly dressed guests, balancing a tray of food. From his wheelchair, Elijah engages in conversation with a couple, as David strolls in, casually attired in a brown jacket and an open-neck shirt. He glances around the gallery, his eyes scanning the room, then comes to a halt in front of a picture. Approaching him is a black woman with striking gray hair, and together they both look out across the bustling gallery. Elijah maneuvers his wheelchair from the gallery down a narrow corridor lined with comics, with David trailing behind him. Elijah freely rolls down a ramp into his office, skillfully swinging his chair around to face David. He is clad in a snug black leather zip-up jacket adorned with short glittering blue lapels. Reaching behind him to a shelf, he picks up a paper, glances at it briefly, then turns it around to show David the drawing of the hero in the cape.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description: As her eyes continue to follow his every movement around the room, she instinctively turns her head in his direction as he climbs into the bed beside her. She takes a moment to gaze deeply into his eyes when he gently rests his head on her shoulder, indulging in that connection before eventually redirecting her focus outward, thoughtfully staring beyond the foot of the bed. Her eyelids lightly flutter and close, and moments later, Audrey opens them once more. At that moment, David lets his eyes gently close too, and his features soften completely into an expression of relaxation and ease. Meanwhile, Joseph, wearing a distinct green T-shirt that features white and gold bands circling the middle area, makes his way downstairs and enters the kitchen. There, he finds both Audrey and David seated comfortably at the table, leaning in toward each other, their hands tenderly interlocked. They both glance his way and smile warmly in his direction. David picks up the newspaper, deeply engrossing himself in its contents, while Audrey moves gracefully over to the cooker, dressed simply in an uncomplicated white T-shirt paired with green and white striped pajama bottoms. Joseph seats himself across from them at the table, casting cautious glances upward toward her, all the while David remains absorbed in reading his paper. She finally turns away from the cooker, and David looks up from the newspaper, nodding in acknowledgment. Joseph, with careful precision, unscrews the cap of a large orange juice carton, meticulously pouring himself only half a glass. After securing the cap perfectly back in place, he stands for a brief moment to remove the carton from the table, and then he returns to his seat, staring intently at the glass before him. The newspaper discreetly slides across the table toward him, catching his attention. Joseph lifts his gaze to meet his father's eyes, who barely nods in the direction of the article he wants him to read. Joseph draws the paper closer to himself and begins to read intently. Just beside the eye-catching headline is a striking black-and-white drawing of a heroic figure, his particularly prominent square jaw effortlessly drawing the eye. As Joseph reads the paper, his lips move subtly as he absorbs the words, then he looks up at David with his mouth agape in sheer awe. David nods subtly, his expression carefully inscrutable. Joseph closes his mouth, swallows hard, and blinks several times in an effort to steady himself emotionally. David places a finger to his lips in a gesture signifying secrecy, and Joseph nods in understanding, as he discreetly wipes away a small tear. David glances downward briefly, then looks back up to offer Joseph a reassuring smile. Over at the Limited Edition Gallery, a bored security guard stands idly, his eyes absentmindedly fixated on a picture, while a waitress skillfully maneuvers through the crowd of smartly dressed guests, balancing a tray of appetizing food. From his wheelchair, Elijah engages animatedly in conversation with a couple, as David strolls in, casually attired in a brown jacket and an open-neck shirt. He glances around the lively gallery, his eyes scanning the room, before coming to a stop in front of a particular picture. Approaching him is a black woman with striking gray hair, and together they gaze out across the bustling gallery filled with people. Elijah then maneuvers his wheelchair smoothly from the gallery into a narrow corridor lined with comics, with David trailing closely behind him. Elijah deftly rolls down a ramp into his office, skillfully swinging his chair around to face David. He is clad in a snug, black leather zip-up jacket adorned with short, glittering blue lapels. Reaching behind him to a shelf, he picks up a paper, glances at it briefly, then turns it around to show David the drawing of the hero in the cape.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: Her eyes follow his movement around the room, tracking him closely as he navigates through the space, and her head pivots towards him as he approaches and settles into the bed beside her. She holds his gaze momentarily, their eyes locking as he gently lays his head on her shoulder, seeking comfort, before she redirects her focus, turning back to stare contemplatively out beyond the foot of the bed. Her eyelids gradually close in a moment of rest, and Audrey blinks them open once more just as David lets his eyes fall shut, his face softening into a relaxed expression. Meanwhile, Joseph, outfitted in a green T-shirt adorned with white and gold bands around the middle, descends the stairs with a steady pace. He enters the kitchen, where Audrey and David are seated at the table, leaning in towards one another in a show of intimacy, their hands intertwined affectionately. They pause their quiet interaction to turn and greet him with warm smiles. David, momentarily disengaging, reaches over to pick up the newspaper, while Audrey moves towards the cooker, dressed casually in a white T-shirt paired with green and white striped pajama bottoms, embodying a relaxed morning vibe. Joseph takes his place at the table, casting an upward, cautious glance at her, all while David remains absorbed in reading the paper, momentarily looking up to acknowledge them with a nod. With deliberate care, Joseph unscrews the cap of a large orange juice carton, ensuring precision as he pours himself a generous half glass. Once satisfied, he securely replaces the cap, stands, and removes the carton from the table, resettling himself as he fixes his stare on the glass before him. In an almost clandestine manner, the paper slides across the table towards him, catching his attention. Joseph raises his eyes to meet his father's, who gives a nearly imperceptible nod towards the story in silent encouragement. Joseph draws the paper closer, focusing on the contents as he reads, his lips moving slightly in subconscious mimicry of the words. His gaze rests on a prominent black and white drawing of a heroic figure adorned with a cape, particularly noting the distinct square jaw. Caught up in the narrative, Joseph peers up at David, his mouth slightly agape in reaction. In acknowledgment, David nods, maintaining an expressionless composure. Joseph slowly closes his mouth, swallows, and blinks with determination, processing the information. David discreetly places a finger to his lips, signaling for secrecy, and Joseph nods, understanding, as he quickly wipes away an emotional tear. David, lowering his gaze momentarily, looks up once more and offers Joseph a reassuring smile. Elsewhere, at the Limited Edition Gallery, a security man, appearing disinterested, contemplates a picture, while a waitress navigates the gathering of smartly dressed guests, balancing a tray of food. Elijah, seated in his wheelchair, engages in conversation with a couple, while David enters the scene, casually dressed in a brown jacket and open-neck shirt, scanning the room with an observant eye before pausing in front of a picture. A woman, with striking gray hair, approaches David, her gaze sweeping across the bustling gallery, prompting David to follow her line of sight. Elijah then maneuvers his wheelchair from the gallery, smoothly transitioning down a narrow corridor lined with comic books, with David trailing closely behind. Elijah skillfully freewheels down a ramp into his office, executing a deft maneuver to spin his chair around, positioning himself to face David. Clad in a form-fitting black leather zip-up jacket accented with short, glittering blue lapels, Elijah reaches towards a shelf behind him, retrieving a paper. He examines it briefly before turning it to present David with the drawing of the hero in the cape, inviting further intrigue and discussion.

test_cases.name: Micro-Actions -> Macro-Actions
test_cases.description: Her eyes follow him as he moves around the room and gets into bed. She briefly makes eye contact with him before turning back to gaze out beyond the foot of the bed. After her eyes close and reopen, David's face relaxes as he closes his eyes. The next morning, Joseph, in a green T-shirt with white and gold bands, enters the kitchen where Audrey and David are sitting at the table, leaning toward each other and holding hands, smiling as they acknowledge him. David reads the paper while Audrey, dressed in a white T-shirt and green and white striped pajama bottoms, attends to the cooker. Joseph sits cautiously at the table, pours himself half a glass of orange juice, and returns the carton before fixating on the glass. David quietly slides the paper across to Joseph, who reads it, noticing a drawing of a hero with a prominent square jaw. Joseph looks up at David, who nods subtly, prompting Joseph to read. Overwhelmed, Joseph closes his mouth, swallows, and blinks away tears as David signals for silence. Joseph nods, wipes away a tear, and receives a reassuring smile from David. Later, at the Limited Edition Gallery, amidst smartly dressed guests and a bored security guard, David enters casually dressed and stops to observe a picture. He momentarily connects with an older woman with gray hair before his attention is drawn to Elijah, who maneuvers his wheelchair through a corridor lined with comics. David follows Elijah into his office, where Elijah, in a black leather jacket with glittering blue lapels, retrieves a paper from a shelf and shows David the drawing of the hero in the cape.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description:
Her eyes follow him around the room, and her head turns to him as he gets into bed beside her. She looks into his eyes for a moment as he lays his head on her shoulder before she turns back and gazes out beyond the foot of the bed, which had been an anniversary gift made from reclaimed wood. Her eyes close, and Audrey opens them again as David closes his, and his face relaxes, reminiscent of the calm that often followed a long day at the office where he worked as an architect. Joseph, in a green T-shirt with white and gold bands around the middle that were popularized by a famous sports team, walks downstairs and into the kitchen, where Audrey, known for her culinary skills, and David are at the table, leaning towards each other, holding hands. They look around at him, smiling warmly. David picks up the paper, the local daily that frequently featured neighborhood stories, and Audrey goes to the cooker, wearing a white T-shirt and green and white striped pajama bottoms. Joseph sits at the table, looking up at her cautiously as David continues to read the paper. She turns from the cooker, and David continues to read, looking up and nodding at last. Joseph unscrews the cap of a big carton of orange juice that was fresh-squeezed from the local orchard and carefully pours himself half a glass full. He replaces the cap, stands to remove the carton from the table, and sits again, staring at the glass with a thoughtful expression. The paper slides surreptitiously across the table to him. Joseph looks up at his father, who almost imperceptibly nods down at the story. Joseph pulls the paper to him and reads. Beside the headline is a black and white drawing of the heroic figure in a cape, with a particularly prominent square jaw, reminiscent of the classic comic book heroes. Joseph gazes down at the paper, his lips moving slightly, and looks up at David, mouth open in a silent question. David nods expressionlessly. Joseph closes his mouth, swallows, and blinks hard. David puts a finger to his lips, signaling the importance of secrecy, and Joseph nods and wipes away a tear. David glances down, then looks up and gives Joseph a reassuring smile. 

At the Limited Edition Gallery, known for its exclusive art collections, a bored security man looks at a picture, and a waitress carries a tray of gourmet food amongst the smartly dressed guests. Elijah is talking to a couple from his wheelchair, a custom-designed chair for his mobility needs, and David wanders in wearing a casual brown jacket and open-neck shirt, glances around him, and stops in front of a picture that was part of a renowned artist’s latest series. A black woman with gray hair approaches him and looks across the busy gallery, a hub for the local art scene, and David looks across the busy gallery as well. Elijah wheels his chair from the gallery down the narrow corridor lined with comics, a personal collection curated over decades, and David follows. Elijah freewheels down a ramp into his office and swings the chair around to face David. He's wearing a tight black leather zip-up jacket with short glittering blue lapels, a signature style choice that reflects his bold personality. He reaches to a shelf behind him and picks up a paper, looks at it, and turns it round, showing David the drawing of the hero in the cape.

In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. Amidst the chaos of a raging civil war a compassionate medic races through bombedout streets. his every desperate step a race against time to save lives in the midst of utter devastation. The dog turns from the cooker, and the rabbit continues to read, looking up and nodding at last. It replaces the cap, stands to remove the carton from the table, and sits again, staring at the glass. The paper slides surreptitiously across the table to the giraffe. The giraffe looks up at its father, who almost imperceptibly nods down at the story. The giraffe pulls the paper to itself and reads. Beside the headline is a black and white drawing of the heroic figure in a cape, with a particularly prominent square jaw. The giraffe gazes down at the paper, its lips moving slightly, and looks up at the rabbit, mouth open. The rabbit nods expressionlessly. The giraffe closes its mouth, swallows, and blinks hard. The rabbit puts a finger to its lips, and the giraffe nods and wipes away a tear. The rabbit glances down, then looks up and gives the giraffe a smile. At the Limited Edition Gallery, a bored penguin looks at a picture, and a zebra carries a tray of food amongst the smartly dressed guests. A lion is talking to a couple from its wheelchair, and the rabbit wanders in wearing a casual brown jacket and open-neck shirt, glances around it, and stops in front of a picture. A black woman with gray hair approaches it and looks across the busy gallery, and the rabbit looks across the busy gallery as well. The lion wheels its chair from the gallery down the narrow corridor lined with comics, and the rabbit follows. The lion freewheels down a ramp into its office and swings the chair around to face the rabbit. It's wearing a tight black leather zip-up jacket with short glittering blue lapels. It reaches to a shelf behind it and picks up a paper, looks at it, and turns it round, showing the rabbit the drawing of the hero in the cape.

test_cases.name: Object Corruption
test_cases.description: Her eyes follow him around the garden, and her head turns to him as he gets into a hammock beside her. She looks into his eyes for a moment as he lays his head on her arm before she turns back and gazes out beyond the edge of the hammock. Her eyes close, and Audrey opens them again as David closes his, and his face relaxes. Joseph, in a red sweater with white and gold stripes around the middle, walks downstairs and into the studio, where Audrey and David are at the desk, leaning towards each other, holding hands. They look around at him, smiling. David picks up the magazine, and Audrey goes to the oven, wearing a white sweater and red and white striped pajama bottoms. Joseph sits at the desk, looking up at her cautiously as David continues to read the magazine. She turns from the oven, and David continues to read, looking up and nodding at last. Joseph unscrews the cap of a large bottle of apple cider and carefully pours himself half a cup full. He replaces the cap, stands to remove the bottle from the desk, and sits again, staring at the cup. The magazine slides surreptitiously across the desk to him. Joseph looks up at his father, who almost imperceptibly nods down at the article. Joseph pulls the magazine to him and reads. Beside the headline is a color illustration of the daring figure in armor, with a particularly prominent round shield. Joseph gazes down at the magazine, his lips moving slightly, and looks up at David, mouth open. David nods expressionlessly. Joseph closes his mouth, swallows, and blinks hard. David puts a finger to his lips, and Joseph nods and wipes away a tear. David glances down, then looks up and gives Joseph a smile. At the Rare Painting Exhibition, a tired security guard looks at a sculpture, and a hostess carries a platter of pastries amongst the elegantly dressed attendees. Elijah is talking to a family from his scooter, and David wanders in wearing a casual blue blazer and open-neck sweater, glances around him, and stops in front of a sculpture. A Hispanic woman with silver hair approaches him and looks across the bustling exhibition, and David looks across the bustling exhibition as well. Elijah wheels his scooter from the exhibition down the narrow corridor lined with posters, and David follows. Elijah freewheels down a ramp into his library and swings the scooter around to face David. He's wearing a tight silver velour button-up blazer with short glittering red cuffs. He reaches to a cabinet behind him and picks up a magazine, looks at it, and turns it round, showing David the illustration of the hero in the armor.

test_cases.name: Action Corruption
test_cases.description: Her eyes drift over him around the room, and her head nods to him as he settles into bed beside her. She glances into his eyes for a moment as he places his head on her shoulder before she turns back and stares out beyond the foot of the bed. Her eyes blink, and Audrey shuts them again as David opens his, and his face tenses. Joseph, in a green T-shirt with white and gold bands around the middle, jogs downstairs and into the kitchen, where Audrey and David are at the table, leaning towards each other, fidgeting with hands. They glance around at him, smirking. David flips through the paper, and Audrey dances to the cooker, wearing a white T-shirt and green and white striped pajama bottoms. Joseph leans at the table, glancing up at her cautiously as David persistently scans the paper. She spins from the cooker, and David persistently scans, peeking up and shaking his head at last. Joseph twists the cap of a big carton of orange juice and swiftly pours himself a glass full. He screws the cap back, rises to push the carton onto the table, and lowers again, peeking at the glass. The paper glides sneakily across the table to him. Joseph glances up at his father, who almost imperceptibly shakes his head down at the story. Joseph drags the paper to him and skims. Beside the headline is a black and white drawing of the heroic figure in a cape, with a particularly prominent square jaw. Joseph peeks down at the paper, his lips twitching slightly, and stares up at David, mouth shut. David nods subtly. Joseph opens his mouth, exhales, and blinks slowly. David waves a finger to his lips, and Joseph nods and rubs away a tear. David looks down, then glances up and gives Joseph a grin. At the Limited Edition Gallery, a bored security man peers at a picture, and a waitress offers a tray of food amongst the smartly dressed guests. Elijah is gesturing to a couple from his wheelchair, and David stumbles in wearing a casual brown jacket and open-neck shirt, scans around him, and halts in front of a picture. A black woman with gray hair approaches him and scans across the busy gallery, and David gazes across the busy gallery as well. Elijah propels his chair from the gallery down the narrow corridor lined with comics, and David trails. Elijah coasts down a ramp into his office and spins the chair around to face David. He's wearing a tight black leather zip-up jacket with short glittering blue lapels. He reaches to a shelf behind him and flips up a paper, glances at it, and spins it round, displaying to David the drawing of the hero in the cape.

test_cases.name: Subject-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: Her antennas follow the refrigerator around the spaceship, and her screen turns to it as it gets into the hammock beside her. She looks into its antennas for a moment as it lays its screen on her antenna before she turns back and gazes out beyond the foot of the hammock. Her antennas close, and the chair opens them again as the lamp closes its, and its bulb relaxes. The sponge, in a red apron with blue and yellow dots around the edges, slides downstairs and into the gym, where the chair and lamp are at the treadmill, leaning towards each other, holding rails. They look around at it, smiling. The lamp picks up the notebook, and the chair goes to the blender, wearing a yellow apron and red and yellow striped sweatpants. The sponge sits at the treadmill, looking up at her cautiously as the lamp continues to read the notebook. She turns from the blender, and the lamp continues to read, looking up and nodding at last. The sponge unscrews the cap of a small basket of apples and carefully pours itself half a leaf full. It replaces the cap, stands to remove the basket from the treadmill, and sits again, staring at the leaf. The notebook slides surreptitiously across the treadmill to it. The sponge looks up at its toaster, who almost imperceptibly nods down at the tale. The sponge pulls the notebook to it and reads. Beside the headline is a colored sketch of the legendary animal in armor, with a particularly prominent pointed horn. The sponge gazes down at the notebook, its bark moving slightly, and looks up at the lamp, lid open. The lamp nods expressionlessly. The sponge closes its lid, swallows, and blinks hard. The lamp puts a branch to its lid, and the sponge nods and wipes away a drip. The lamp glances down, then looks up and gives the sponge a wink. At the Uncommon Relic Exhibit, a yawning alien looks at a sculpture, and a cook carries a platter of fruits among the casually dressed robots. The meteor is talking to a cluster of stars from its scooter, and the lamp drifts in wearing a casual pink scarf and button-down vest, glances around it, and stops in front of a sculpture. A purple bird with golden feathers approaches it and looks across the crowded exhibit, and the lamp looks across the crowded exhibit as well. The meteor scoots its scooter from the exhibit down the narrow hallway lined with maps, and the lamp follows. The meteor free-scoots down a slide into its nook and spins the scooter around to face the lamp. It's wearing a stretchy white velvet button-up vest with short shimmering red feathers. It reaches to a compartment behind it and picks up a scroll, looks at it, and turns it round, showing the lamp the sketch of the animal in the armor.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action Corruption
test_cases.description: Her gaze trails after the cat around the room, and her nose pivots to the cat as it curls into bed beside her. She peers into the cat's eyes for a moment as it places its head on her knee before she swivels back and stares out beyond the edge of the bed. Her eyes flutter open, and Rebecca blinks them again as Nicholas shuts his, and his features soften. Mark, in a red T-shirt with black and silver stripes around the middle, skips downstairs and into the kitchen, where Rebecca and Nicholas are at the table, leaning towards each other, entwining fingers. They glance around at the cat, grinning. Nicholas lifts up the book, and Rebecca heads to the microwave, wearing a black T-shirt and red and black checkered pajama bottoms. Mark plops at the table, glancing up at her warily as Nicholas continues to skim the book. She turns from the microwave, and Nicholas keeps skimming, finally glancing up and bobbing at last. Mark twists the lid of a big carton of milk and cautiously pours himself half a glass full. He secures the lid, rises to move the carton from the table, and plops down again, staring at the glass. The book glides stealthily across the table to him. Mark gazes up at his uncle, who almost imperceptibly nods down at the article. Mark drags the book to him and reads. Beside the headline is a sepia drawing of the courageous figure in a cloak, with a particularly pronounced round ear. Mark peers down at the book, his lips twitching slightly, and glances up at Nicholas, mouth agape. Nicholas nods blankly. Mark shuts his mouth, gulps, and blinks rapidly. Nicholas presses a finger to his mouth, and Mark nods and dabs away a tear. Nicholas glances down, then looks up and gives Mark a wink. At the Rare Collection Exhibit, an uninterested usher glances at a sculpture, and a caterer balances a platter of snacks among the elegantly attired visitors. Ian is chatting with a pair from his scooter, and Nicholas meanders in wearing a laid-back green jacket and open-collar shirt, scans around him, and halts in front of a sculpture. A white man with black hair approaches him and surveys the bustling exhibit, and Nicholas surveys the bustling exhibit as well. Ian maneuvers his scooter from the exhibit down the narrow passage lined with paintings, and Nicholas trails. Ian coast downhill into his studio and pivots the scooter around to face Nicholas. He's sporting a snug white denim zip-up jacket with short shimmering red lapels. He reaches to a shelf behind him and lifts a book, glances at it, and flips it round, showing Nicholas the drawing of the hero in the cloak.

test_cases.name: Object-Action Corruption
test_cases.description: Her eyes track him around the auditorium, and her head swivels to him as he dives into the hammock beside her. She peers into his eyes for a moment as he rests his chin on her elbow before she turns back and glances out beyond the end of the hammock. Her eyes flutter shut, and Audrey opens them again as David shuts his, and his expression softens. Joseph, in a red hoodie with black and silver stripes across the back, jogs upstairs and into the library, where Audrey and David are on the couch, leaning away from each other, passing notes. They glance around at him, grinning. David lifts the textbook, and Audrey goes to the bookshelf, wearing a black hoodie and gray and black striped sweatpants. Joseph stands by the couch, gazing up at her nervously as David continues to skim the textbook. She turns from the bookshelf, and David continues to skim, glancing up and winking at last. Joseph uncorks the bottle of milk and cautiously tips himself a quarter of a cup. He replaces the cork, stands to move the bottle from the couch, and perches again, staring at the cup. The textbook drifts surreptitiously across the couch to him. Joseph glances up at his father, who almost imperceptibly raises an eyebrow at the passage. Joseph tugs the textbook to him and peruses. Beside the title is a sepia sketch of the valiant character in a robe, with a particularly prominent hooked nose. Joseph studies the textbook, his lips twitching slightly, and looks up at David, mouth ajar. David nods impassively. Joseph closes his mouth, gulps, and blinks slowly. David puts a hand on his cheek, and Joseph nods and rubs his eye. David looks down, then glances up and gives Joseph a nod. At the Curated Showcase Studio, a disinterested usher regards a photograph, and a host carries a platter of drinks among the elegantly attired visitors. Elijah is chatting with a duo from his scooter, and David strolls in wearing a loose gray blazer and buttonless shirt, surveys the surroundings, and halts in front of a photograph. A white woman with auburn hair approaches him and glances over the bustling studio, and David glances over the bustling studio as well. Elijah maneuvers his scooter out of the studio along the tight corridor lined with posters, and David trails behind. Elijah freewheels down a slope into his den and spins the scooter to face David. He's wearing a snug red silk button-down jacket with short shimmering gold cuffs. He reaches to a cupboard behind him and grabs a magazine, examines it, and spins it around, showing David the sketch of the champion in the robe.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: His wings hover over a pond, and his fins rotate to it as it jumps into a hammock beside him. He stares at its wings for a second as it rests its fin on its beak before he rotates back and squints out beyond the tip of the hammock. His wings flutter, and Marvin flutters them again as Lucy unfurls hers, and her snout stiffens. Mabel, in a red scarf with black and silver stripes around the edge, slithers upstairs and into the library, where Marvin and Lucy are on the desk, leaning away from each other, clapping elbows. They peer around at her, frowning. Lucy drops the scroll, and Marvin floats to the easel, wearing an orange scarf and red and black dotted slippers. Mabel perches on the desk, peering down at him skeptically as Lucy continues to analyze the scroll. He floats from the easel, and Lucy continues to analyze, peering down and shaking at last. Mabel twists the cork of a tiny vial of grape soda and recklessly spills herself a full mug. She seals the cork, kneels to fetch the vial from the desk, and kneels again, glaring at the mug. The scroll floats secretly across the desk to her. Mabel peers down at her mother, who minutely squints up at the tale. Mabel snags the scroll to her and analyzes it. Beside the caption is a pastel doodle of the villainous creature in a moat, with a significantly rounded oval snout. Mabel scrutinizes down at the scroll, her toes twitching faintly, and peers down at Lucy, mouth sealed. Lucy squints impassively. Mabel opens her mouth, breathes, and flickers softly. Lucy puts a wing to her talons, and Mabel squints and shakes away a giggle. Lucy peers up, then squints down and gives Mabel a frown. At the Infinite Photobook Studio, a fascinated curator stares at a sculpture, and a janitor drops a sack of laundry among the poorly dressed artists. Lucas is singing to a trio from his stool, and Lucy lumbers out wearing a formal gray tuxedo and closed-collar tie, squints down him, and marches in front of a sculpture. A white man with auburn hair confronts her and stares across the tranquil studio, and Lucy stares across the tranquil studio as well. Lucas crawls his stool to the studio up the broad hallway filled with novels, and Lucy leads. Lucas spins his stool up a staircase into his library and throws the stool around to glare at Lucy. She's wearing a loose white woolen pull-over with long shimmering orange tassels. She reaches to a crate behind her and drops a scroll, peers at it, and rotates it sideways, hiding from Lucy the doodle of the villain in the moat.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: Audrey and David share a quiet moment in bed, her eyes closing and his face relaxing as they settle beside each other. The next morning, Joseph joins them in the kitchen, where Audrey and David sit at the table, holding hands. As David reads the paper, Joseph cautiously pours orange juice and notices a story featuring a heroic figure. David subtly encourages Joseph to read it, and they share a silent understanding. Later, at the Limited Edition Gallery, David arrives in casual attire, while Elijah, in a wheelchair, engages with guests. Elijah then leads David to his office, showing him a drawing of the hero, hinting at a deeper connection to the story.

the chair around to face David Joseph pulls the paper to him and reads Her eyes close and Audrey opens them again as David closes his and his face relaxes Joseph closes his mouth swallows and blinks hard He is wearing a tight black leather zipup jacket with short glittering blue lapels They look around at him smiling Elijah is talking to a couple from his wheelchair and David wanders in wearing a casual brown jacket and openneck shirt glances around him and stops in front of a picture She turns from the cooker and David continues to read looking up and nodding at last Elijah wheels his chair from the gallery down the narrow corridor lined with comics and David follows Her eyes follow him around the room and her head turns to him as he gets into bed beside her Joseph in a green Tshirt with white and gold bands around the middle walks downstairs and into the kitchen where Audrey and David are at the table leaning towards each other holding hands At the Limited Edition Gallery a bored security man looks at a picture and a waitress carries a tray of food amongst the smartly dressed guests

test_cases.name: Rotate Half Paragraph
test_cases.description: Beside the headline is a black and white drawing of the heroic figure in a cape with a particularly prominent square jaw Joseph gazes down at the paper his lips moving slightly and looks up at David mouth open David nods expressionlessly Joseph closes his mouth swallows and blinks hard David puts a finger to his lips and Joseph nods and wipes away a tear David glances down then looks up and gives Joseph a smile At the Limited Edition Gallery a bored security man looks at a picture and a waitress carries a tray of food amongst the smartly dressed guests Elijah is talking to a couple from his wheelchair and David wanders in wearing a casual brown jacket and openneck shirt glances around him and stops in front of a picture A black woman with gray hair approaches him and looks across the busy gallery and David looks across the busy gallery as well Elijah wheels his chair from the gallery down the narrow corridor lined with comics and David follows Elijah freewheels down a ramp into his office and swings the chair around to face David He is wearing a tight black leather zipup jacket with short glittering blue lapels He reaches to a shelf behind him and picks up a paper looks at it and turns it round showing David the drawing of the hero in the cape Her eyes follow him around the room and her head turns to him as he gets into bed beside her She looks into his eyes for a moment as he lays his head on her shoulder before she turns back and gazes out beyond the foot of the bed Her eyes close and Audrey opens them again as David closes his and his face relaxes Joseph in a green Tshirt with white and gold bands around the middle walks downstairs and into the kitchen where Audrey and David are at the table leaning towards each other holding hands They look around at him smiling David picks up the paper and Audrey goes to the cooker wearing a white Tshirt and green and white striped pajama bottoms Joseph sits at the table looking up at her cautiously as David continues to read the paper She turns from the cooker and David continues to read looking up and nodding at last Joseph unscrews the cap of a big carton of orange juice and carefully pours himself half a glass full He replaces the cap stands to remove the carton from the table and sits again staring at the glass The paper slides surreptitiously across the table to him Joseph looks up at his father who almost imperceptibly nods down at the story Joseph pulls the paper to him and reads
